long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your health with the simple and easy-to-use BMI Calculator Extension. This extension helps you calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on your age, weight, and height, with support for both metric and imperial units. Instantly see which BMI category you fall into with color-coded results for quick and easy interpretation.

Features:
Age Input: Calculate BMI based on your age for more personalized insights.
Weight Units: Choose between kilograms (kg) and pounds (lbs) for weight input.
Height Input: Enter height in feet and inches.

Color-Coded Results:
Instantly see your BMI category with background colors:
Orange: Underweight
Green: Normal weight
Yellow: Overweight
Red: Obesity

User-Friendly Interface: 

Simple and intuitive design for a seamless user experience.
Quick Calculation: Get your BMI result with just a few clicks.

How to Use:

Enter your age: Input your age in the designated field.
Enter your weight: Choose your preferred unit (kg or lbs) and input your weight.
Enter your height: Input your height in feet and inches.
Calculate: Click the "Calculate BMI" button to get your result.
View your result: Your BMI and category will be displayed with the corresponding background color.

This BMI Calculator Extension is a handy tool for anyone looking to monitor their BMI and maintain a healthy lifestyle. Add it to your Chrome browser today and keep track of your health with ease!
